about_the_game:
This includes the title track "I Spent a Weekend in Puzzleburg," which can be heard on the game's title screen (containing lyrics), along with an instrumental version of that same song which plays whenever you are on the game's overworld screen.

Note that this only contains the title track from the game (one version with vocals and one version that's instrumental). It is not a complete soundtrack of all music in the game. This is the only music from the game for sale.
